bl

Class TaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bl.TaskManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TaskManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains the arrayList of the tasks. Provides the methods to manage this list that corresponds to the main functionalities. This is the main interaction to the GUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
